item.title: Coronavirus: when will the pandemic end?
item.description: With the recent COVID-19 pandemic, many countries have imposed very severe lockdowns on their citizens in order to stop the spreading of this highly contagious virus. After several weeks of isolation, everyone has the same question on their mind: ‘When will it end?'. Let’s try to answer this with some statistics and a little imagination!
